title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Tony Dungy, Aqib Talib, Chad Millman
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Tony Dungy, Aqib Talib, Chad Millman
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. Colin tells USC what they must do after firing Clay Helton (2:00), explains the secret to betting football games early in the season (7:20), and names his favorite backup QB in the NFL (8:08). NFL Hall-of-Famer Tony Dungy on the best coaching he ever gave Peyton Manning, and the two most important characteristics for a successful QB (9:00). Aqib Talib gives his dark horse MVP candidate, and his most impressive team in Week 1 (19:40). Plus, Chad Millman lets Colin know if his NFL picks are sharp or square for Week 2 (25:20). Make sure to follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates, and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
